TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Lifetime extends System.Object

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此可选元素用在或`wst:RequestSecurityToken` `wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse`消息中以指示所需或必需的令牌生存期。This optional element is used in `wst:RequestSecurityToken` or `wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse` messages to indicate the desired or required lifetime of a token. 所有时间都以 UTC 时间指定。All times are specified in UTC time. [!INCLUDE[wif_wstrust_ref](~/includes/wif-wstrust-ref-md.md)]
